tool.name: SAGA.shapes_grid.16
tool.description: Gradient Vectors from Direction and Length
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDIR False isArrayLEN False output_data_VECTORS $output_data_VECTORS name SAGA.shapes_grid.16 DIR $DIR LEN $LEN STEP $STEP SIZE_MIN $SIZE_MIN SIZE_MAX $SIZE_MAX AGGR $AGGR STYLE $STYLE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_VECTORS $OutputSection_VECTORS.outputType_VECTORS transmissionMode_VECTORS $OutputSection_VECTORS.transmissionMode_VECTORS

param.name: DIR
param.label: Direction
param.help: Direction The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: LEN
param.label: Length
param.help: Length The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: SIZE_MIN
param.label: Size Range (min value)
param.help: size range as percentage of step

param.name: SIZE_MAX
param.label: Size Range (max value)
param.help: size range as percentage of step

param.name: AGGR
param.label: Aggregation
param.help: how to request values if step size is more than one cell

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_VECTORS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Gradient Vectors from Direction and Length
